elements.description:
`lrndesign-gallery-thumb`
A LRN element that renders a thumbnail button for the gallery.

properties.name: controls
properties.description: id of the thumbnail button target

properties.name: roundedEdges
properties.description: round the edges of the thumbnail?

methods.name: ready
methods.description: set iron-a11y-keys target to this

methods.name: _tapped
methods.description: fire navigation tapped event

attributes.name: controls
attributes.description: id of the thumbnail button target

attributes.name: rounded-edges
attributes.description: round the edges of the thumbnail?

elements.description:
`lrndesign-gallery-zoom`
A LRN element that renders the zoom feature for the gallery.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: optional: name for iron-icon used to indicate zoom

methods.name: attached
methods.description: attached

methods.name: _isAttrSet
methods.description: returns true if the given attribute is not null

methods.name: imgZoom
methods.description: Zoom in by calling  downstream function.

methods.name: toggleDialog
methods.description: Toggles the dialog.

methods.name: _detailsChanged
methods.description: updates the details.

methods.name: _dialogChanged
methods.description: Toggles the dialog.

methods.name: _itemChanged
methods.description: Toggles dialog based on anchor

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: optional: name for iron-icon used to indicate zoom

elements.description:
`lrndesign-gallery-carousel-item`
A LRN element that renders a collection of gallery items into a carousel.

properties.name: imageStyle
properties.description: style css of image container (sets aspect ratio)

properties.name: theme
properties.description: theme of the gallery: default or dark

methods.name: _updateDetails
methods.description: updates the item details

methods.name: _getIndex
methods.description: returns index of the previous or next item

methods.name: _isAttrSet
methods.description: returns true if the given attribute is not null

attributes.name: image-style
attributes.description: style css of image container (sets aspect ratio)

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: theme of the gallery: default or dark

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Ready.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: set iron-a11y-keys target to this

methods.name: _getIcon
methods.description: get the icon

methods.name: _tapped
methods.description: fire navigation tapped event

elements.description:
`lrndesign-gallery-carousel`
A LRN element that renders a collection of gallery items into a carousel or a single media item into a layout.

properties.name: imageStyle
properties.description: height css of iron image (sets aspect ratio in xs or extraWide)

properties.name: sizing
properties.description:
default sizing: fit parent by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

properties.name: theme
properties.description: theme of the carousel: default or dark

methods.name: attached
methods.description: gets unique id for carousel and sets it as a target

methods.name: _itemsLoaded
methods.description: gets unique id for carousel and sets it as a target

methods.name: _getExtraWide
methods.description: returns the proper padding to maintain image aspect ratio and updates

methods.name: _getImageStyle
methods.description: returns the proper padding to maintain image aspect ratio and updates

methods.name: goToItem
methods.description: go to item by id, or index

methods.name: _onNavTapped
methods.description: when a thumbnail is tapped, goes to that item

methods.name: _isSelected
methods.description: sets selected attribute of thumbnail

methods.name: _isAttrSet
methods.description: returns true if the given attribute is not null

attributes.name: image-style
attributes.description: height css of iron image (sets aspect ratio in xs or extraWide)

attributes.name: sizing
attributes.description:
default sizing: fit parent by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: theme of the carousel: default or dark

elements.description:
`lrndesign-gallery-grid`
A LRN element that renders a collection of gallery items into a carousel or a single media item into a layout.

properties.name: sizing
properties.description:
default sizing: fit container by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

properties.name: theme
properties.description: theme of the carousel: default or dark

methods.name: attached
methods.description: gets unique id for carousel and sets it as a target

methods.name: _itemsLoaded
methods.description: gets unique id for carousel and sets it as a target

methods.name: goToItem
methods.description: go to item by id, or index

methods.name: _onNavTapped
methods.description: when a thumbnail is tapped, goes to that item

methods.name: _isSelected
methods.description: sets selected attribute of thumbnail

methods.name: _selectionChanged
methods.description: allows a grid item to be opened based on an anchor

methods.name: _isAttrSet
methods.description: returns true if the given attribute is not null

methods.name: _getImageStyle
methods.description: returns the proper padding to maintain image aspect ratio and updates

attributes.name: sizing
attributes.description:
default sizing: fit container by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: theme of the carousel: default or dark

elements.description:
`lrndesign-gallery-print`
A LRN element that renders the print view of a gallery item.

methods.name: _isAttrSet
methods.description: returns true if the given attribute is not null

properties.name: grid
properties.description: thumbnail grid layout, default is false (carousel layout)

properties.name: sizing
properties.description:
default sizing: fit screen by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)

methods.name: _itemsLoaded
methods.description: adds additional properties to gallery

methods.name: _isAttrSet
methods.description: returns true if the given attribute is not null

attributes.name: grid
attributes.description: thumbnail grid layout, default is false (carousel layout)

attributes.name: sizing
attributes.description:
default sizing: fit screen by cropping (cover)
or with letterboxing (contain)
